thread.title: HU picked 2nd in MEAC hoops, Norfolk State's Short preseason POY
thread.title_full: HU picked 2nd in MEAC hoops, Norfolk State's Short preseason POY

author: Dave Johnson
title: HU picked 2nd in MEAC hoops, Norfolk State's Short preseason POY
text:
HU picked 2nd in MEAC hoops, Norfolk State's Short preseason POY Dave Johnson 
Norfolk State guard Jeff Short was chosen the MEAC Preseason Player of the Year and North Carolina Central was picked as the team to beat in the conference in a vote of the coaches and sports information directors. 
Short was the MEAC's second-leading scorer last season with an average of 19.1 points a game. He was named first-team all-conference. 
Also on preseason team was Hampton's Quinton Chievous, Howard's James Daniel, North Carolina A&T's Bruce Beckford, and Maryland-Eastern Shore's Dominique Elliott. Daniel is a graduate of Phoebus. 
Hampton's Brian Darden, another Phantom grad, was on the second team. The Pirates Jarvon Pressley made third team. 
In the conference race, N.C. Central received 14 of the 23 first-place votes with Hampton taking nine of the remaining 12. The Eagles won the regular-season title last season but the Pirates won the conference tournament.
